verses.verse: <S%H3588>"When<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>cuts<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, and you <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> them and <S%H3427>settle<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> and in their <S%H1004>houses,<s%>

you shall <S%H914>set<s%> <S%H914>aside<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for yourself in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess.<s%>

"You shall <S%H3559>prepare<s%> the <S%H1870>roads<s%> for yourself, and <S%H8027>divide<s%> into <S%H8027>three<s%> <S%H8027>parts<s%> the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5157>give<s%> you as a <S%H5157>possession,<s%> so that <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

"Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>case<s%> of the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H2421>live:<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H5221>kills<s%> his <S%H7453>friend<s%> <S%H1847>unintentionally,<s%> <S%H1097><s%> not <S%H8130>hating<s%> him <S%H8543>previously<s%> <S%H8032><s%> –

as <S%H834>when<s%> [a man] <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H9194>forest<s%> with his <S%H7453>friend<s%> to <S%H2404>cut<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5080>swings<s%> the <S%H1631>axe<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and the <S%H1270>iron<s%> [head] <S%H5394>slips<s%> <S%H5394>off<s%> the <S%H6086>handle<s%> and <S%H4672>strikes<s%> his <S%H7453>friend<s%> so that he <S%H4191>dies<s%> – he may <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and <S%H2421>live;<s%>

<S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> in the <S%H2552>heat<s%> of his <S%H3824>anger,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> him, <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H7235>long,<s%> and <S%H5221>take<s%> his <S%H5315>life,<s%> though he was not <S%H4941>deserving<s%> of <S%H4194>death,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> he had not <S%H8130>hated<s%> him <S%H8543>previously.<s%> <S%H8032><s%>
<S%H5921>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You shall <S%H914>set<s%> <S%H914>aside<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for yourself.'

"And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7337>enlarges<s%> your <S%H1366>territory,<s%> <S%H3152>just<s%> as He has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to your fathers, and <S%H1>gives<s%> you <S%H5414>all<s%> the <S%H3605>land<s%> <S%H776>which<s%> He <S%H834>promised<s%> to <S%H1696>give<s%> your fathers –

<S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H6213>carefully<s%> <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in His <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3605>always<s%> <S%H3117><s%> – then you shall <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for yourself, <S%H5921>besides<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>

"So <S%H9345>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> will not be <S%H8210>shed<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you as an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> be on you.

"But <S%H3588>if<s%> there is a <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H8130>hates<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> and <S%H693>lies<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> for him and <S%H6965>rises<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> him and <S%H5221>strikes<s%> him so that he <S%H4191>dies,<s%> and he <S%H5127>flees<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%>

then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> him from <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H2347>pity<s%> him, but you shall <S%H1197>purge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H9345>innocent<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that it may <S%H2895>go<s%> <S%H2895>well<s%> with you.

"You shall not <S%H5472>move<s%> your neighbor's <S%H1366>boundary<s%> mark, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H7223>ancestors<s%> have <S%H1379>set,<s%> in your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess.<s%>

"A <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against a <S%H376>man<s%> on account of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed;<s%> on the <S%H6310>evidence<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> a <S%H1697>matter<s%> shall be <S%H6965>confirmed.<s%>
<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H2555>malicious<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H6965>rises<s%> up against a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H6030>accuse<s%> him of <S%H5627>wrongdoing,<s%>

then <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have the <S%H7379>dispute<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> will be [in office] in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"And the <S%H8199>judges<s%> shall <S%H1875>investigate<s%> <S%H3190>thoroughly;<s%> and <S%H2009>if<s%> the <S%H5707>witness<s%> is a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> [and] he has <S%H6030>accused<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%>

then you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to him <S%H3152>just<s%> as he had <S%H2161>intended<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to his <S%H251>brother.<s%> Thus you shall <S%H1197>purge<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

"And the <S%H7604>rest<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> and be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H3254><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

"Thus you shall not <S%H2347>show<s%> <S%H2347>pity:<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> for <S%H7272>foot.<s%>
